00332     var newColor,
00333         colorPanel = [self colorPanel],
00334         alpha = [colorPanel opacity];
00335 
00336     switch(sender)
00337     {
00338         case    _hueSlider:
00339         case    _saturationSlider:
00340         case    _brightnessSlider:      newColor = [CPColor colorWithHue: [_hueSlider floatValue]
00341                                                               saturation: [_saturationSlider floatValue]
00342                                                               brightness: [_brightnessSlider floatValue]
00343                                                                    alpha: alpha];

00346                                         break;
00347

00349         case    _greenSlider:
00350         case    _blueSlider:            newColor = [CPColor colorWithCalibratedRed: [_redSlider floatValue]
00351                                                                              green: [_greenSlider floatValue]
00352                                                                               blue: [_blueSlider floatValue]
